name: Toon Shooters 2: The Freelancers
description:
Blast your way across the galaxy in a classic inspired arcade side-scrolling shooter!

Five years after the fall of the Fleet, the Toons are back in action to wreck threats old and new... it was a massacre, on both sides!

The Game

15 stages of various puzzles and ridiculous bosses.

Up to 5 Co-Operative multiplayer available with roles for each player (diagonal shots, healers, bombers...)

8 playable characters: Otis, Ben, Angelica, Big Ted, Yolo Creed, Paul, Jonathan & Messenger.

7 custom-fit pets (Laser Pup, Laser Dog, Bomber Orange, Homing Missiles, Regenerist, Spinner, Wingman & Mon Furious Rapid Shot)

Controls

Mouse (recommended):
- Left click (hold) to move around screen.
- Right click (tap) to fire special weapon.
- Right click (hold & release) to fire charge shot.

Keyboard:
- WSAD to move around the screen
- Space (tap) to fire special weapon.
- Space (hold & release) to fire charge shot.
